data.title: 10. Archdiocese of Manila
data.text:
Archidioecesis Manilensis

Created diocese: February 6, 1579. Elevated to Archdiocese:

August 4, 1595. Comprises: Makati City, Manila, Pasay City,

San Juan, and Mandaluyong City. Suffragans: the Dioceses

of Antipolo, Cubao, Imus, Kalookan, Malolos, Novaliches,

Parañaque, Pasig, San Pablo, and the Apostolic Vicariates

of Puerto Princesa and Taytay. Titular: the Immaculate Conception.

Secondary Patrons: St. Polycarp, St. Dominic de

Guzman, St. Francis of Assisi, St. Andrew the Apostle.

Archbishop

His Eminence

JOSE F. CARDINAL ADVINCULA JR., DD

Born: March 30, 1952 in Dumalag, Capiz. Ordained Priest: April 4, 1976.

Appointed Bishop of San Carlos in Negros Occidental: July 25, 2001.

Ordained Bishop of San Carlos: September 8, 2001. Installed Bishop of

San Carlos: September 11, 2001. 3rd Metropolitan Archbishop of Capiz:

November 9, 2011. Installed Archbishop of Capiz: January 11, 2012. Created

Cardinal & assigned as Cardinal-Priest to San Vigilio: November 28, 2020.

Appointed Archbishop-elect of Manila: March 25, 2021. Installed as 33rd

Archbishop of Manila: June 24, 2021.

Residencia del Arzobispo
